notes_text: As of April 2019, public possession of small amounts is a non-criminal offense punished by escalating fines. A third offense can result in criminal charges, however. Possession in the privacy of one's home is not punished.
notes: As of April 2019, public possession of small amounts is a non-criminal offense punished by escalating fines. A third offense can result in criminal charges, however. Possession in the privacy of one's home is not punished.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Israel}} As of April 2019, public possession of small amounts is a non-criminal offense punished by escalating fines. A third offense can result in criminal charges, however. Possession in the privacy of one's home is not punished.<ref>{{cite news |title=Partial decriminalization of public cannabis use takes effect Sunday night |url=https://www.timesofisrael.com/partial-decriminalization-of-public-cannabis-use-to-come-into-effect/ |access-date=5 April 2019 |work=[[The Times of Israel]] |date=31 March 2019 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190609200544/https://www.timesofisrael.com/partial-decriminalization-of-public-cannabis-use-to-come-into-effect/ |archive-date=9 June 2019 |url-status=live}}</ref>
